name: vivino_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Vivino in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('[class*="explorerCard"], [class*="wineCard"], [class*="cleanWineCard"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="vintageTitle"] a, [class*="wine"] a, a[href*="/w/"]'); const wineryEl = el.querySelector('[class*="winery"], a[href*="/wineries/"]'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="averageValue"], [class*="averageRating"], [class*="rating"]'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('[class*="price"], [class*="amount"]'); const regionEl = el.querySelector('[class*="region"], [class*="country"], [class*="Location"]'); results.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href || '', winery: wineryEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', rating: ratingEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', price: priceEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', region: regionEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); const query = new URL(window.location.href).searchParams.get('q') || ''; return { query, result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
